channel.title: The Gentlemans Closet - Comedy Podcast
channel.description:
The awesome improvised comedy talk podcast, Hosted by Scottish Stand Up Billy Kirkwood along side Graeme McCormack who welcomes you to join them and a host of special guests to put aside a whole 30 mintues aside to talk about exclusively pointless but damn funny chatter about just everything that comes to mind deep from the sanity of wit - The Gentlemans closet!
Set us a banter topic by contacting the show just email - mrbillykirkwood@hotmail.co.uk
Check us out online at www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk
Or visit our facebook page - http://www.facebook.com/gentlemanscloset
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Free Comedy Podcast...Where Banter is KING!

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 6: EP 4 – “Madam, Moose Does Taste Like Pussy!”
item.description: Call the constable, hide your mother, put the coastguard on red alert and tell that upstart Gaddafi to put the biscuits back in the tin because those internet knights of the Banter, Comedian Billy Kirkwood, colossal strumpet bumper Graeme McCormack and the man Prof Brian Cox calls Dad, Stuart Woodland bestride the whores of chat and bang like monkeys all for YOUR pleasure on the world’s number one free banter-cast The Gentleman’s Closet – Comedy Podcast. This week misters Billy, Grumbles and Woodfiend engage in a delicious frothing gloop of banter goo about everything from Wrestling, camping, wearing ladies pants, the REAL taste of Moose and much much more... If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic visit our website to find out how! Check us out online at www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk Or visit our facebook page - http://www.facebook.com/gentlemanscloset or Twitter @thegentscloset www.billykirkwood.co.uk www.facebook.com/mrbillykirkwood www.facebook.com/ilikebillykirkwood www.twitter.com/wreck_the_place www.facebook.com/#!/profile.php?id=718110204 www.twitter.com/graememccm RSS FEED: http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml or Listen via itunes or or with RSS http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 6: EP 3 – “The Sheen/Freeman Paradox”
item.description: Well its been quite a week in the Closetverse what with Charlie Sheen's Tiger blood addiction finally being revealed (not news to us I might add)and Stuart Woodland's triumphant return from rehab. Help us celebrate in the kind of style that would have sunk Oliver Reed by joining those internet knights of the Banter, Comedian Billy Kirkwood, barely coherant baffoon Graeme McCormack and the king of sodomy Stuart Woodland as they teach the world a lesson or two about manners and the lost art of seduction in the world’s number one free banter-cast The Gentleman’s Closet – Comedy Podcast. This week the chaps engage in a deliciously frothing gloop of banter about everything from the Charlie Sheen furore, Gene Hackmans tragically short career, things to say to Morgan Freeman in a tight spot and much much more... If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic visit our website to find out how! Check us out online at www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk, our facebook page: www.facebook.com/gentlemanscloset or our Twitter page: www.twitter.com/thegentscloset www.billykirkwood.co.uk www.facebook.com/mrbillykirkwood www.facebook.com/ilikebillykirkwood www.twitter.com/wreck_the_place www.facebook.com/graememccormack www.twitter.com/graememccm RSS FEED: http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml or Listen via itunes or or with RSS http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 6: EP 2 – “Here’s what I’m offering”
item.description: Once the world waited with baited breath for the second coming of Christ but he missed the banter boat and now lies forgotten and in disgrace while we bestride the world as kings of all we survey...BEHOLD...those internet knights of the Banter. Comedian Billy Kirkwood & baffoon Graeme McCormack talk like they’re lives depended on it for the second episode in the awesome new series of the world’s number one free banter-cast The Gentleman’s Closet – Comedy Podcast. This week misters Billy and Grumbles (KING OF THE GOBLINS) engage in delicious frothing gloop of banter goo about everything from bartering for goods, bad wedding plans, imaginary Cyndi Lauper sitcom, the best location Billy to store his splooge and much much more! If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic visit our website to find out how! Check us out online at www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk Or visit our facebook page - http://www.facebook.com/gentlemanscloset www.billykirkwood.co.uk www.facebook.com/mrbillykirkwood www.facebook.com/ilikebillykirkwood www.twitter.com/wreck_the_place www.facebook.com/#!/profile.php?id=718110204 www.twitter.com/graememccm RSS FEED: http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml or Listen via itunes or or with RSS http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 6: EP 1 – “Junkies ROOL”
item.description: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 6: EP 1 – “Junkies ROOL” Dear Christ and buggerry release the hounds, shoot the servants, Telegraph the Brigdear back to Geneva and enjoy no interruptions as your ears are about to get pounded harder than blind boxing porn star, yes those internet knights of the Banter Comedian Billy Kirkwood & Graeme McCormack stride the dragons of chatter and ride right into your sunset and unleash a supernova of glorious comedy whoredom (yes we’ll do it for free) for brand awesome series of the world’s number one free banter-cast The Gentleman’s Closet – Comedy Podcast. (Normal Podcast description will be resume next week) This week misters Billy and Grumbles (KING OF THE GOBLINS) engage in delicious frothing gloop of banter goo about everything from Clown torcher, Having babies, Bad Metaphors , Wasp wrestling and much much more..all this and much more. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic visit our website to find out how! Check us out online at www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk Or visit our facebook page - http://www.facebook.com/gentlemanscloset www.billykirkwood.co.uk www.facebook.com/mrbillykirkwood www.facebook.com/ilikebillykirkwood www.twitter.com/wreck_the_place www.facebook.com/#!/profile.php?id=718110204 www.twitter.com/graememccm RSS FEED: http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml

item.title: THE GENTLEMANS CLOSET AND TRAMPLED BAT CHRISTMAS COMEDY PODCAST PARTY - Part 1
item.description: IT’S CHRISTMAS M’EFFERS! Time to don your cock tinsel, pop on a wee jizzy Santa Hat and rock with your rock with your Bawbles out! As the Billy and Graeme from the Gentleman’s Closet team up with their pals from the Trampled Bat Comedy Podcast for a Christmas Comedy Party and gorge themselves on a busting buffet of Banter as they stretch there hymans and throb their Uvulas in this the first of two Holiday specials! Sit down, open wide and prepare for a Chrimbo comedy pumping featuring suck talk-tastic topics such as The Pope, Christmas, X-Factor losers, Bad Presents, Coke a Cola, Food, Shoe-ism and Chris Conroy Comedy Convoy HOOT HOOT! And if you’d like to set us a banter topic for this or a future episode you can do so by emailing show host Billy Kirkwood via: mrbillykwood@hotmail.co.uk If you’d like more information on the show, how to get in contact, dontate, subscribe free via itunes or to listen/download the show free, just visit any of the following sites for more info www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk or www.billykirkwood.co.uk or www.trampledbat.com Listen via itunes or http://billykirkwood.podomatic.com/ or with RSS http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml

item.title: Series 5 Episode 9 - NOV 28th Live Show Trailer........(much longer than it shout be!)
item.description: Yes this is a very special trailer the 'Lads' have recording for the first ever LIVE recording of the Gentlemans Closet Comedy Podcast. A night of unforgettable laughs with a live stand up show featuring special guests from the UK’s comedy scene including Martin Bearne, "Q from Airdrie" Quentin Reynolds, hosted by Billy Kirkwood and a the THE MAIN EVENT the first every LIVE banter filled episode recording of the worlds only Com-talk-improv-podcast The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast (with Stuart, Graeme and Billy), where you pick the topics, where you ask the questions...and we all bring the funny! Sunday Nov 28th Show Starts 8pm Tickets £6 B.Y.O.B (includes free Pizza) Buy your ticckets from Su Casa or Tel: 01292 618657 Su Casa Coffee House 4 Lorne Arcade, 115 High Street KA7 1QL Ayr 01292 618657 Su Casa's facebook - http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=133499550022094 www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk www.billykirkwood.co.uk *** TELL EVERYONE!!!***

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 5: EP 8 –“The Road to Su Casa”
item.description: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 5: EP 8 –“The Road to Su Casa” Covered in Maple Syrup and the leaves of the season our Gabber Gorgans (Billy Kirkwood, Stuart Woodland, and Graeme McCormack) gorge themselves on a busting buffet of Banter as they stretch there hymans and throb their Uvulas in preparation for the first ever live recording of the Closet this weekend., knocking our this very special mini episode, featuring suck talk-tastic topics such as Vagina Surgery (Before and after), Breast safety concerns, Apple pies, Fire risk, Junkie sadness and much much more. Remember we’re recording our first every episode in front of a LIVE audience on Sunday Nov 28th (tickets are still available from Su-casa tel: 01292 618657) so if you’d like to set us a banter topic for this or a future episode you can do so by emailing show host Billy Kirkwood via: mrbillykwood@hotmail.co.uk Or visit any of the following sites for more info www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk or www.billykirkwood.co.uk

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast : 2010 HALLOWEEN SPECIAL - PART 1
item.description: Moahahahahab Spooky tits asunder, it’s time to get your creepy pants on and run out into the streets of your villiage covered in owl blood and spunk and let the world know the Gentleman’s Closet is kicking off the first of it’s two Halloween specials..with this very special episode recording entirely in the dark! As always Count Billy ‘Toadfish’ Kirkwood , Graeme ‘Fritzl’ McCormack and Stuart ‘Gacy’ Woodland beat off their gabber guns over such banter beef as The best ways to punish a burglar, Ghosts, Crappy Horror Movies, Bad Halloween Outfits, Sour Halloween sweeties challenge, and so...very much more. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic, just it get in touch with show host Billy by emailing – mrbillykirkwood@hotmail.co.uk Check us out online at www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk Or visit our facebook page - http://www.facebook.com/gentlemanscloset

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 5: EP 5 – “Bring me a dead owl...A BIG ONE!”
item.description: Splishy Splashy Yes it’s time to fill up your Gabber Goblets once more as we bring you another Shit your pants funny episode of the world’s number one free banter-cast The Gentleman’s Closet – Comedy Podcast. This week misters Billy Kirkwood and Graeme McCormack are joined once more by guest Mr Stuart Woodland who as well as treating worse than a ginger headed –French – stepchild engage delicious direction free banter about everything from whoring yourself out on the internet The Power of William Shatner, Michael Bay's Holiday Videos, Hypnotists’, Jill Dando, Assholes, Fanny Sand and much more. item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 5: EP 4 –“Madam Id rather ride your Hat stand!”
item.description: Yes the world’s number one free banter-cast with more stuffed inside it than a fat lad at a gangbang buffet! Once again we say Guten Tag to yet another episode of gab-tastic The Gentleman’s Closet – Comedy Podcast. This week misters Billy Kirkwood and Graeme McCormack flap there delicious gums over such nonsensical topics as Benefit Cheats, the healing quality of a piece, Sherlock Holmes, Spunk speeds, bad accents, Back Tattoo’s, Fifty Cent, and yet more plans for the Tits Ahoy festival.. Tankers at the ready and CHEERS! item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast: SERIES 5 EP 3 “Hello Mum’s”
item.description: Pants off and Tally Ho, yes it’s time for another episode of The Gentleman’s Closet – Podcast. Hosted by Comedian Billy Kirkwood with guest Mr Graeme McCormack out Bantering Gabber Gigolos, wrap there talkative tongues around another trumpet full of topics this week such as Bees, Driving Instructors, Suicidal Taxi drivers, Bad 80’s Music, Drugs, Robot Poo, Toy Cars and Birthdays as quite the time is had, as Master McCormack waves good bye to his 30th year and Madam Pamela and her five lovely sisters all in one sitting (You’ll see..Or hear really). BOSH! If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic, just it get in touch with show host Billy by emailing – mrbillykirkwood@hotmail.co.uk Or visit www.facebook.com/mrbillykirkwood Listen via itunes or http://billykirkwood.podomatic.com/ or with RSS http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml

item.itunes:summary:
Pants off and Tally Ho, yes it’s time for another episode of The Gentleman’s Closet – Podcast. Hosted by Comedian Billy Kirkwood with guest Mr Graeme McCormack out Bantering Gabber Gigolos, wrap there talkative tongues around another trumpet full of topics this week such as Bees, Driving Instructors, Suicidal Taxi drivers, Bad 80’s Music, Drugs, Robot Poo, Toy Cars and Birthdays as quite the time is had, as Master McCormack waves good bye to his 30th year and Madam Pamela and her five lovely sisters all in one sitting (You’ll see..Or hear really). BOSH!
If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic, just it get in touch with show host Billy by emailing – mrbillykirkwood@hotmail.co.uk
Or visit www.facebook.com/mrbillykirkwood
Listen via itunes or http://billykirkwood.podomatic.com/ or with RSS http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 5: EPISODE 2 "Oi get the other one out!"
item.description: More Trifle? No? Well how about a cup of tea and a pile of stupendous banter buns as and nonsense as we are delighted to present another episode of The Gentleman’s Closet – Podcast. Hosted by Comedian Billy Kirkwood with guest Mr Graeme McCormack as they scoffle down some top banter chow for your delectation. This week's topics include the Election, Wasted money, Gazza, Things to do before the Apocalypse, Your Roaul Moat serial killer name, the best festivals ever, Columbo and much much more! Let the banter begin. Hats on! If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic, or just get in touch, email – mrbillykirkwood@hotmail.co.uk ** COMING SOON – THE BILLY KIRKWOOD SHOW From the makes of The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast, stay tuned for details!

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 5: EPISODE 1 "Chuffling Glorious!"
item.description: Is it a bird? is it a plane? Is it two ridiculously hairy Scotsman shouting, swearing, balling and of course bantering there backsides off…YOU BET YOUR ASS! Yes the Gentleman’s Closet comedy finally returns after nearly 7 months away for a brand new series and to unleash frolicsome fooling around and rub out some top notch banter jizm over a host of new topics to kick things off for the start of the 2010 season with Graeme McCormack joining host Comedian Billy Kirkwood. This episodes topics including, Bumming, the world cup, serial killers and much much more. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic , just it get in touch, email – mrbillykirkwood@hotmail.co.uk ** COMING SOON – THE BILLY KIRKWOOD SHOW From the makes of The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast, stay tuned for details!

item.title: The Gentlemans Closet Comedy Podcast - RETURNS JULY 2010!!
item.description: Yes yes, after a long lay off The Gentlemans Closet Comedy Podcast FINALLY returns to rid the world of boredom and fill it once more with Stupendous Comedy Banter with Host Comedian Billy Kirkwood and his collegue Mister Graeme McCormack as they set aside 30 mintues to talk about everything and anything but with no real point expect comical shenanigans. But where have the boys been? you'll have to tune it to find out..The Banterama begins July 2010! To contact the show or set topics you can email us at mrbillykirkwood@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: EP 7 – 2009 Year in Review special “It brings my piss to a boil”
item.description: Off it’s face on Christmas Brandy The Gentleman’s Closet drunkingly staggers toward 2010 while glancing back at the cheeky Gypsy of 2009 making off with it’s wallet it’s time for this years Gentleman’s closet 2009 year in review special. This week we once again unleash frolicsome fooling around with regulars Billy Kirkwood, Graeme McCormack, Stuart Woodland and the return of special guest “Q from Airdrie” Quentin Reynolds as they rub out some top notch banter jizm over the year that was 09. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic , just it get in touch, email – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk NEXT EPISODE: Jan 7th

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: XMAS MESSAGE 2009
item.description: Ding dong and merrily on bloody high The Gentleman’s Closet chaps are taking off Christmas day this year but have recorded a special wee message with host Billy Kirkwood answering some of your emails and bashing out what the closet has coming over the holidays and into 2010. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic , just it get in touch, email – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk NEXT EPISODE: Dec 28th “Review of 2009 special with Billy, Graeme and special guest Quentin Reynolds” Visit our website http://www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: EP 6 “No you’ve had too much sugar!”
item.description: Tra-la-la-la-la yes it’s time for some high jinks and banter related horseplay once again from deep within The Gentleman’s Closet as we skip cheekily towards the Yule tide period……..tee hee period. This week we once again unleash frolicsome fooling around with regulars Billy Kirkwood and Graeme McCormack welcoming back special guest Mr Chris Henry as they shoot they shoot the breeze this about such scuttlebutt as Bad pubs, Butlins Red Coats, Jim Savelle’s: Necrophiliac, Selling out to Disney, Good and Bad presents, The Shiteness of Subbuteo, CD Players, Swapsey’s, Sunny D, Gumtree and much more banter-ish antics. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic , just it get in touch, email – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk NEXT EPISODE: Dec 24th “Christmas special with special guest Quentin Reynolds”

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: EP 5 “Well hello Mister Fancypants!”
item.description: Sup’ homeboys, yes The Gentleman’s Closet posse are loading up there banter bullets to unload a drive by of chattering nonsense and get some comedy flowing up in this biatch. This week the talk tomfoolery has Regulars Billy Kirkwood and Mr Graeme McCormack welcoming special guest Mr Chris Henry as they fizzle and get all hizzle when rolling out the scuttlebutt this week about Creepy things, The face fanny, The Broons, Babies, Old Fellah’s talk, Tentcle Porn, Bad Work Nights out, Stoppid Kicks and much more banter-ish antics. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic , just it get in touch, email – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: EP 4 “The only good varmint poontang is dead varmint poontang!”
item.description: GUTEN TAG! Slightly belated due to Kirkwood’s birthday shenanigans The Gentleman’s Closet banter blaggards are back once more for some farcical fannying about and jostling jestering chatter with Billy Kirkwood and Mrs Graeme McCormack once again joined by special guest reigning Scottish Comedian of the Year 2009 John Gavin. This week the bumbling banter is about Impersonators’, British Legion, Timmy Mallet’s Jam, Pensioners Threesomes, X-factor auditions, Bald Boobage, Darren fucking Day, the michael jackson seance, John Barrowman, bums and much more banter-ish antics. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic, or just it get in touch, email – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: EP 3 “ Forget that Sh*t here comes Mongo!”
item.description: AHOI! The Gentleman’s Closet gang load up the Cortina, pack a lunch of potted meat, brandy and red cola schnapps and hit the road and head for deepest darkest Hamilton for chatter This week the talk tomfoolery has Regulars Billy Kirkwood and Mr Graeme McCormack welcoming special guest reigning Scottish Comedian of the Year 2009 John Gavin as the undertake shocking scuttlebutt about Scary Kids Telly, Diddy Dick and Dom, Christmas in the Gavin Household, dodgy comminuty centre courses and much more banter-ish antics. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic , just it get in touch, email – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk Visit our website http://www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk

item.title: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: EP 2 - “How rude”
item.description: Booyah! The Gentleman’s Closet returns to chug down a brandy glass filled to the brim with durty comedy sweeties. Join Billy Kirkwood, ‘Muppet Fanny coniser’ Graeme McCormack, ‘Miss’ Stuart Woodland our regular Jabbering banter hounds as they set aside 15 of the King’s minutes to talk good, the bad and downright Ugly points of Sex, Xfactor and facebook shenanigans. If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic , just it get in touch, email – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk Visit our website http://www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk

item.title: The RETURN of The Gentlemans Closet - Comedy Podcast: SERIES 4 "The Banter is Back!"
item.description: The Gentleman’s Closet Comedy Podcast SERIES 4: The Banter is BACK! Yes finally the Gentleman’s closet is back and BACK FOR GOOD! Back from the longest ad break every The Gentleman’s Closet returns with a new episode podcast for you to getting pounded into like a stripper at Army base you horny little Unicorns This episode the right honourable Billy Kirkwood Esq is joined by closet regulars and the former ‘This is it’ Choreographer Graeme McCormack V.C and Mental Lemming Stuart Woodland for a bit of the old nattering nattering from deep within the Gentleman’s Closet. To kick off the new series banter over such topics as America, Steven Gately, Ninja Sex, Zombies, Highway, Biscuit etiquette, and much much more. Visit our website http://www.thegentlemanscloset.co.uk If you’re interested in contacting the closet either to set a banter topic you can email the show at – banter@thegentlemanscloset.co.uk Listen via itunes or http://billykirkwood.podomatic.com/ or with RSS http://billykirkwood.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml
